summary: Dreadmyst Hollow is a Vampire Stronghold based off some of the lesser known vampires of the Elder Scrolls series. I aim to provide a challenging dungeon experience with enhanced combat styles and scripted boss fights with an attempt to bring my own personal touch to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/bijvyh.jpg[/img]









Description======================================================================
Dreadmyst Hollow is a Vampire Stronghold based off some of the lesser known vampires of the Elder Scrolls series. I aim to provide a challenging dungeon experience with enhanced combat styles and scripted boss fights with an attempt to bring my own personal touch to Skyrim.

You will not be able to access the entire dungeon until you have started the quest.

THE NOTE NEEDED TO START THE QUEST IS IN THE FALKRETH INN ON THE MAIN COUNTER.

If you encounter a bug while playing this mod please let me know (through the comments) as soon as possible. Bug report volume and intensity will determine when i will roll out a fix.


[youtube]gUv3I-LwVHw[/youtube]




Requirements=============================================================
This mod requires Dawnguard and the latest update (currently 1.8).
If you do not meet these two requirements before playing this mod and you run into
trouble I will not be able to help you.

You are NOT required to be a vampire in order to play this mod and being a vampire adds no pluses or minuses to the experience.



Installation====================================================================
Manual Installation:
Copy all the files from the mods folder into your data folder.
File paths should look like this:
Data-Meshes_DreadmystHollow
Data-Textures-DreadmystHollow


Change Log=======================================================

V1.0 11/13/2012 -Initial Release

V1.1 11/25/2012 -Fixed an issue with the Tombstone Activator
-Fixed an issue where the Vampires would attack Gargoyles




Known Issues and bugs===================================================
None as of yet.

If you find issues and are unsure how to isolate them try this for basic mod troubleshooting tips.

http://www.creationkit.com/Mod_Troubleshooting


Permissions========================================================================

If you would like to use any part of my mod please ask first. If you wish to use parts of this mod
that were created by others, you must obtain permission from them. Note that the only assets you must ask outside permission for are a few of the meshes used in this mod from Oaristys & Tony67's Modders Resource Pack.
